ResearchProjectDef.label: 鼠族中世纪
ResearchProjectDef.description: 学习鼠族中世纪服饰科技.\n\n田园风光的鼠鼠们，在中世纪生活的同时亦是剑与火的史诗

ResearchProjectDef.label: medieval cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn advanced medieval cooking techniques, enabling the construction of iron pots and stone ovens for preparing complex dishes and baked goods.
